title: Any teachers out there?
body:
Looking to get better with the help of a coach or teacher to better my game on all lanes and using strategies to my advantage. 

Add me in game if you're willing to help

XxbrixtonxX

replies.body:
strategic advantages:

Top: Malphite, Teemo, Vayne, Maokai, Shen
Mid: Galio
Bot: Cait, Thresh, Leona
Jungle: Shyvana, Yi
